original: @146b # // rgya gar skad du /🔽pra ti tya sa mu tpa da hri da ya k'a ri k'a / bod skad du /
analyzed: @146b # // rgya gar skad du / pra ti tya sa mu tpa da hri da ya k'a ri k'a / bod skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:🔽Pratītyasamutpādasāra-kārikā

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: To youthful Mañjuśrī I pay homage.

original: yan lag bye brag bcu gnyis gang //
analyzed: yan lag bye brag bcu gnyis gang //
translated: The twelve specific links🔽The Sage taught as dependent origination

original: thub pas rten 'byung gsungs de dag / nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal dang // gsum po dag tu zad par 'dus //
analyzed: thub pas rten 'byung gsungs de dag / nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal dang // gsum po dag tu zad par 'dus //
translated: Are exhausted in the three: afflictions, actions, and suffering.

original: dang po brgyad dang dgu nyon mongs //
analyzed: dang po brgyad dang dgu nyon mongs //
translated: The first, eighth, and ninth are afflictions.

original: gnyis dang bcu pa las yin te //
analyzed: gnyis dang bcu pa las yin te //
translated: The second and tenth are actions.

original: lhag ma bdun yang sdug bsngal yin //
analyzed: lhag ma bdun yang sdug bsngal yin //
translated: The remaining seven are suffering.

original: bcu gnyis chos ni gsum du 'dus //
analyzed: bcu gnyis chos ni gsum du 'dus //
translated: The twelve factors are subsumed in three.

original: gsum po dag las gnyis 'byung ste //
analyzed: gsum po dag las gnyis 'byung ste //
translated: From the three arise the two;🔽From the two arise the seven;

original: gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang //
analyzed: gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang //
translated: From the seven arise the three.

original: gsum 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo de //
analyzed: gsum 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo de //
translated: This wheel of existence

original: nyid ni yang dang yang du 'khor //
analyzed: nyid ni yang dang yang du 'khor //
translated: Turns again and again.

original: 'gro kun rgyu dang 'bras bu ste //
analyzed: 'gro kun rgyu dang 'bras bu ste //
translated: All beings are causes and effects,

original: 'di la sems can ci yang med //
analyzed: 'di la sems can ci yang med //
translated: But in this there are no sentient beings.

original: stong pa kho na'i chos rnams las //
analyzed: stong pa kho na'i chos rnams las //
translated: From phenomena that are empty alone

original: stong pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba zad //
analyzed: stong pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba zad //
translated: phenomena that are empty arise.

original: bdag dang bdag gi med pa'i chos //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi med pa'i chos //
translated: The phenomena of self and being mine do not exist.

original: kha thon mar me me long rgya //🔽me shel sa bon skyur dang sgras //
analyzed: kha thon mar me me long rgya // me shel sa bon skyur dang sgras //
translated: Recitation, a lamp, a mirror,🔽a magnifying glass, a seed, sourness, and sound

original: phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba yang //
analyzed: phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba yang //
translated: are the examples of the arising of an effect🔽from a cause that is not transferred.

original: mi 'pho bar yang mkhas rtogs bya //
analyzed: mi 'pho bar yang mkhas rtogs bya //
translated: The wise should understand that the aggregates🔽are not transferred to the next life.

original: shin tu phra ba'i dngos la yang //🔽gang gi chad par rnam brtags pa ;
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i dngos la yang // gang gi chad par rnam brtags pa ;
translated: Even in the case of very subtle things,

original: / rnam par mi mkhas de yi ni //
analyzed: / rnam par mi mkhas de yi ni //
translated: those who imagine that they are annihilated

original: rkyen las byung ba'i don ma mthong //
analyzed: rkyen las byung ba'i don ma mthong //
translated: do not see the meaning of dependent origination.

original: 'di la gsal bya gang yang med //
analyzed: 'di la gsal bya gang yang med //
translated: There is nothing at all to be clarified here,

original: gzhag par bya ba ci yang med //
analyzed: gzhag par bya ba ci yang med //
translated: and nothing at all to be posited.

original: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //
analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //
translated: Look correctly at the correct,

original: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
analyzed: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
translated: and if you see correctly, you will be liberated.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa //
translated: The Verses on the Essence of Dependent Origination

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: by Ācārya Ārya Nāgārjuna is complete.
